text: @SpeakerPelosi @GOPLeader wants you to expose yourself to Covid & die. The only way Trump can stay in power to escape justice is to murder as many people as possible. He wants you dead and he wants you to spread Covid19 to others. He doesn’t care if the @HouseGOP has to die too. @ICCT_TheHague https://t.co/4ufguWSuRQ
